lead_paragraph: Tyler Lyons was back on the mound Thursday for the St. Louis Cardinals, the stakes slightly smaller than the last time he pitched.

headline.print_headline: Lyons Pitches 3 Innings to Help Cardinals Beat Marlins, 4-3
headline.main: Lyons Pitches 3 Innings to Help Cardinals Beat Marlins, 4-3
